title: Pytt i panna
description: This dish translates as 'small pieces in a pan' and that's exactly what it is, lots of leftovers or bits and pieces from the fridge fried up in a pan. Serve with lingonberry jam for a true taste of Sweden.
ingredients: 1 large carrot, cut into ½cm/¼in cubes
150g/5½oz leftover roast meat, such as  pork, beef and lamb, diced
large sprig of thyme, leaves only
30g/1oz dried mushrooms, soaked in 150ml/5fl oz just boiled water
few tablespoons chopped marjarom or oregano
